name: Scroter
description:
Unleash chaos on your opponents collecting powerups that will tear them to shreds! From lightning-fast speed boosts to devastating explosive weapons, you'll have everything you need to claim the crown and emerge victorious!

  • Play against the bots or challenge your friends!
  • Get to the crown or smash your opponents!
  • 19 Unique powerups!
  • 60 Levels with explosive surprises!
  • Physics-Based movement, watch out to fall down!
